timeline.message:
fix-issue-6866

updated fxml file to be able to appear in preference search.

Fix Preferences Search Recursively

Created a recursive method to find all child node from each tab in preferences search

HBoxes rollback and set scanInputControls static

rollback controls inside HBoxes and changing to static scanInputControls

timeline.bodyText: Please give ths method a more meaningful name. You are scanning for label controls.
timeline.author: Siedlerchr

timeline.message:
Update PreferencesSearchHandler.java

method name updated to: scanLabeledControls

timeline.author: calixtus

timeline.bodyText: Is there any system in reordering the imports in the fxmls? If not, why not leave it alphabetically like every other import in the .Java files...
